definitions.definition: Related to India , varying historically from the entire Indian subcontinent to India north of the Deccan , especially the plains of the Ganges and Jumna .
of or pertaining to Hindustani music .

main_definition: ( dated outside of South Asia ) Related to India , varying historically from the entire Indian subcontinent to India north of the Deccan , especially the plains of the Ganges and Jumna .
secondary_definitions: ( music ) of or pertaining to Hindustani music .
